name: ADP
description: Designing better ways to work through cutting-edge products, premium services and exceptional experiences that enable people to reach their full potential. HR, Talent, Time Management, Benefits and Payroll. Informed by data and designed for people.
Headline: ADP provides comprehensive payroll and HR solutions for businesses of all sizes, from small to large.
ShortDescription: ADP - providing solutions that simplify work

Highlights.name: Payroll
Highlights.description: Fast, easy, accurate payroll and tax, so you can save time and money.

Highlights.name: Benefits & Insurance
Highlights.description: Employee benefits, flexible administration, business insurance, and retirement plans.

Highlights.name: Integrations
Highlights.description: Quickly connect ADP solutions to popular software, ERPs and other HR systems.

enhanced_description: ADP provides comprehensive solutions for HR, Talent, Time Management, Benefits, and Payroll. Their offerings include cutting-edge products, premium services, and exceptional experiences designed to enable people to reach their full potential. They focus on fast, easy, and accurate payroll and tax services, comprehensive employee benefits and insurance administration, and robust time and attendance tracking. ADP also offers a wide array of talent management capabilities, including compensation management, performance management, employee engagement, and recognition tools. The solutions are informed by data and designed for people, aiming to simplify work and improve employee happiness and engagement.
competitive_advantages: Comprehensive suite of HR, Payroll, Time, Benefits, and Talent solutions
Fast, easy, and accurate payroll and tax processing
Flexible administration for employee benefits and retirement plans
Robust integration capabilities with popular software, ERPs, and other HR systems
Focus on improving employee happiness and engagement
roi_benefits: Time savings in payroll and HR administration
Cost savings through efficient payroll and tax management
Improved accuracy in payroll and tax processes
scalability_features: Designed for large and global enterprises, indicating inherent scalability for varying workforce sizes and geographical requirements
